member.exception: Thrown if the matrix is not a square Matrix

member.exception: Thrown if Number of Rows in m1 is not equal to Number of Columns in m2

member.exception: Thrown if this is not a Square Matrix

member.exception: Thrown if the MAtrices have diffrent Sizes

The (unit) Axis for the Rotation/Imaginary part

member.summary: Rotate the passed Vector by this Quaternion

member.summary: Returns the Matirx for this Quaternion.
member.remarks: Before the Matrix is generated, the Quaternion will get Normalized!!!
